title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Title: Part-Time Remote Virtual Assistant for Translation Agency

Body:

Looking for a highly organized and communicative Remote Virtual Assistant to help run day-to-day operations of Claravia Language Solutions.

Duties include:
 • Managing translator hiring
 • Responding to client inquiries
 • Sending quotes and contracts
 • Tracking jobs and payment logs
 • Creating a weekly report

Pay: $160/month base + $40–$50 bonus
Hours: ~10–15/week
Payments: PayPal only
To apply, send your resume and a brief note to: [Your Email]
